experience.title: Staff Software Engineer
experience.duties:
Lead front-end web developer for GV AMPP Asset Management, a next generation cloud-based platform that facilitates media asset management and remote production for the video broadcast industry. Helped to design and develop the UI for managing, updating, displaying, and searching across assets and asset metadata. The UI framework was developed using TypeScript and Angular and was designed to run within a cloud-hosted microservice architecture.


Helped to design and develop the Windows-based video production and content management application, called GV STRATUS, using C# and WPF.


Participated in the design and development of a configuration and software deployment tool that customers used to commission and update their Grass Valley systems on site.
Worked on adding new features to an application that managed content for our line of video servers.
